gel:script.sql:query: SELECT O.ID, F.ID, V.ID FROM CLB_DMS_FILES F INNER JOIN ODF_CA_HIEV_HTML_FILE O ON O.HTML_FILE = F.PARENT_FOLDER_ID INNER JOIN CLB_DMS_VERSIONS V ON V.FILE_ID = F.ID WHERE F.NAME = '2016-2021 Corporate Plan.png'

gel:log.message: Found 2016-2021 Corporate Plan.png: odf_pk=${vFileODFPK}. FileID=${vFileFileID}. VersionID=${vFileVersionID}.

core:forEach.sql:update: UPDATE ODF_CA_STRATEGIC_ITEM set MAP_URL = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(MAP_URL, 'fileId=5103202', 'fileId=${vFileFileID}'), 'versionId=5103203', 'versionId=${vFileVersionID}'), 'odf_pk=5002000', 'odf_pk=${vFileODFPK}') WHERE CODE = 'SI0001'

gel:script.sql:query: SELECT O.ID, F.ID, V.ID FROM CLB_DMS_FILES F INNER JOIN ODF_CA_HIEV_HTML_FILE O ON O.HTML_FILE = F.PARENT_FOLDER_ID INNER JOIN CLB_DMS_VERSIONS V ON V.FILE_ID = F.ID WHERE F.NAME = '2016 IT Plan.png'

gel:log.message: Found 2016 IT Plan.png: odf_pk=${vFileODFPK}. FileID=${vFileFileID}. VersionID=${vFileVersionID}.

core:forEach.sql:update: UPDATE ODF_CA_STRATEGIC_ITEM set MAP_URL = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(MAP_URL, 'fileId=5103207', 'fileId=${vFileFileID}'), 'versionId=5103208', 'versionId=${vFileVersionID}'), 'odf_pk=5002001', 'odf_pk=${vFileODFPK}') WHERE CODE = 'SI0026'

gel:log.message: Found 2016 Operations Plan.png: odf_pk=${vFileODFPK}. FileID=${vFileFileID}. VersionID=${vFileVersionID}.
